name: sublunary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the world or life on earth, especially in contrast to the spiritual world: It came to an end at last, however, like all sublunary things.sublunary world One feels as close to paradise as this sublunary world allows.
More examplesFewer examplesHow do the heavenly bodies physically affect the sublunary world?The book identifies the two classes to which all sublunary beings belong, namely that of plants and that of animals.Of course, markets are often rigged in favour of some and not others, but perfect fairness cannot be found in the sublunary world.
